title: Thursday's top brokerage calls: ITC, Manappuram Finance and LIC Housing Finance - CNBCTV18
content: Thursday's top brokerage calls: ITC, Manappuram Finance and LIC Housing Finance  CNBCTV18
description: Brokerage Radar: Here's what Jefferies and Morgan Stanley say about ITC while CLSA says 'buy' Manappuram Finance shares. Meanwhile, CLSA sees a 14-15 percent return on equity for LIC Housing shares. Check out today's brokerage calls here-
